title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 337.2 - Procedure for processing disability retirement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 337.2 - Procedure for processing disability retirement

State Regulations

The procedure for retirement set forth in section
74
of the Retirement and Social Security Law
shall be applicable to members of the New York State Employees' Retirement

System who file applications for disability retirement pursuant to article 15
of the Retirement and Social Security Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
337.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
